item.description:
What: Wikipedia Meetup
Date and Time: Friday, April 15, 7:00 pm

As most people can't make it tonight, we're having a special WP Meetup this Friday at 7:00. Please join us... we'll mainly be planning our next meetup later this month, enjoying the spring, and discussing local volunteer posts for Wikimania.

Come one, come all ! Bring friends, loved ones, invisible unicorns... it's getting warm enough for ice cream again! :-)

For more information, see http://en.wikipedia.o...
item.name: The Boston Wikipedia April Meetup
